about_the_game:
Take a journey into a survivalist future with this pack of over 200 MAX ready, high quality game-making assets. This DLC has everything you'll need to create your own post apocalyptic or abandoned workshop, including buildings, tools, furniture, fuel pumps, billboards, weaponized tools and loads more.

Included in this DLC you'll find the following GameGuru MAX assets:

Weapons

4 new weaponized game ready tools, fully rigged for player and NPC use.

1 x Lump Hammer
1 x Screwdriver
1 x Spanner
1 x Crowbar.

Buildings.

4 Workshops
1 Annex

Take a journey into a survivalist future with this pack of over 200 MAX ready, high quality game-making assets. This DLC has everything you'll need to create your own post apocalyptic or abandoned workshop, including buildings, tools, furniture, fuel pumps, billboards, weaponized tools and loads more.

name: GameGuru MAX Wasteland Booster Pack - Workshop

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: GameGuru MAX Wasteland Booster Pack - Workshop - $29.99 $23.99

package_groups.title: Buy GameGuru MAX Wasteland Booster Pack - Workshop

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 | AMD Opteron 4274 HE, or better.
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 | AMD Radeon R9 Fury, with 4 GB VRAM, or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: Windows-compatible keyboard and mouse
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel i7-9700K | AMD 3700X, or better.
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 | Radeon 5700 XT, with 8 GB VRAM, or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: Windows-compatible keyboard and mouse

short_description: This DLC includes everything you'll need to create your own post apocalyptic workshop, including buildings, tools, furniture, fuel pump, advertising hoardings and loads more.
